name: active_merchant
description: Active Merchant is a simple payment abstraction library used in and sponsored by Shopify. It is written by Tobias Luetke, Cody Fauser, and contributors. The aim of the project is to feel natural to Ruby users and to abstract as many parts as possible away from the user to offer a consistent interface across all supported gateways.  Added support for PayPal recurring payment with the SOAP API.

name: acts-as-readable
description: A simple plugin that allows a user to mark anything as 'read.' Common usage would include forum posts, news items, etc.

name: acts-as-taggable-on
description: A tagging plugin for Rails applications that allows for custom tagging along dynamic contexts.

name: badger
description: Badger is a simple Rails plugin that creates photo badges

name: DevNewsletter
description: DevNewsletter allows your iOS and Mac app users to subscribe to your MailChimp mailing list.

name: IceCream
description: A sample app to illustrate whether refactoring table view data source is good or bad.

name: rails_templates
description: Rails app templates to jumpstart a new application

name: searchable_attributes
description: Searchable plugin is a Rails plugin that makes searching on ActiveRecord attributes a snap

name: will_paginate
description: Most awesome pagination solution for Rails
